title: A Strong Place for Boys to Grow Up As Men
itunes:author: Guest: Mark Hancock
itunes:summary:
Mark Hancock described how Trail Life USA (was founded in response to the Boy Scouts decision to step away from their moral and spiritual foundation). He described how many young boys don’t have godly male role models today, and how Christian Men can step up to help fatherless boys.

Receive a CD of today's broadcast for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-07-26?refcd=1446305&treatment=one-time-gift

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/a-strong-place-for-boys-to-grow-up-as-men/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
